publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-682.1 Mark Ballard: Local Governance (Scotland) Bill-As an amendment to motion (S2M-682) in the name of Mr Andy Kerr, insert at end "but, in so doing, encourages the Scottish Executive to give consideration to implementing the recommendations of the Interim Report of the Single Transferable Vote Working Group and including in the Bill the rules under which the Local Government Boundary Commission for Scotland and the Scottish Ministers will operate in determining ward boundaries."
